item.description:
Congratulations all on keeping this great group together for a full 6 months! This is officially longer than most of my relationships, so I am very excited about the possibility of spending more and more time together. I'm taking it back to our roots by heading to a bar known for its great beer - Bukowski's!

I've heard a lot of great stuff about this place and look forward to giving it a shot! There's two branches - we're going to the one in Inman Square.

Want to see why we should be going there? Check out their MySpace profile for a list of all their beers. Yum!

I heard the food was pretty dang good, too. RSVP and I will do my best to get us a table. :)

And remember - it's cash only. D'oh!
item.how_to_find_us: You know my mug by now :) If not you can call my cell.
item.name: Celebrate our 6-month anniversary! :)
